website_summaries.verdict: The Mizuno Wave Enigma 5 was designed for high mileage runners. It is a neutral running shoe that gives plenty of cushioning for longer and more efficient performance. Many runners liked the shoe because of its durability and responsiveness, but a few also were disappointed because it runs small and a bit expensive. In summary, the Enigma is a shoe worth recommending to peers.
pros: The breathable upper mesh were noted in some reviews since it offers high levels of ventilation for the foot
The Ortholite sock liner prevents moisture and maintains a bacteria-free inner environment
It uses the Mizuno U4ic technology for maximum shock attenuation and a responsive ride
The mid-sole unit features mechanisms that give extra underfoot support for better performance
A gender-specific Smooth Ride technology makes each step more fluid and agreeable
A few runners took note of the shoe’s reliable traction while running on the road
cons: The Mizuno Wave Enigma 5 is expensive
According to some reviews, the sole unit wears off quickly
Some runners noticed that the shoe runs small

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Running Shoe for High arch medium width feet
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a premium neutral cushioned. I do not wear socks; inside is plush and breathable. Fit is glove like. I prefer this shoe over Nike Vomero 10 and ASICS Gel-Nimbus 17. I think the Mizuno brand is often overlooked that would be a big mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Null

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says. They are very kind to your feet and body. All I have to do is see how much mileage the shoe will handle. The soles look like they have a little more rubber than the average distance shoe. Update: This is a really good shoe. There isn't much arch support for high arched people, but I wear aftermarket insoles in most of my shoes. The soles wear very well on hard surfaces and protect your feet and body well which is the only thing that counts when you're out there running to get some good exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno recommended them and my feet are happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I went to the MIZUNO shoes website prior to purchasing these. Their website is very user friendly and recommended this style shoe for what I was using it for. I run a few times a week about 3-5 miles at a time. I needed to get some shoes with a softer cushion in the ball of the foot due to pain developing from my former (older non-mizuno brand shoes) by running on the road (not a treadmill or gym runner). I owned this shoe for a few weeks and racked up some miles upon them and so far so good. They are light and comfortable to wear. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: GANBATEKUDASAI

customer_reviews.title: Got the perfect pair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely loving these shoes. I had a foot pain and was looking for a nice shoe to give me better grip around the foot and comfort while walking. These are very nice quality, steady and well cushioned. I am thoroughly enjoying the pair from last almost six months. I walk a lot and its still have a good tread, same level of comfort it had when I bought. You would not go wrong with it, just keep in mind that since its bit cushioned that makes it bit tighter around the foot (from my individual experience) but personally I like that tighter grip around foot.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought these exact shoes his first pair had worn to bits I asked him why he likes them. He says they say nice things to him. ha ha. They are built in such a way to compensate comfortably for a deformity in his foot caused by gout. They are very light weight which he likes also.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E

customer_reviews.title: This is my first pair of mizunos and I love these things
customer_reviews.text: So first off I'm not a runner.... at least not since high school cross country 20 years ago. I'm a big guy but not over weight. This is my first pair of mizunos and I love these things. They are easily the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. Not to much or too little cushion. Perfect support. Perfect Arch. This for me is the Goldie locs shoe, just right. I use them for every day walk about and walking on the treadmill etc at the gym and my feet etc always feel great. I've even received a few compliments on the look. Anyway I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AnonymousGuy

customer_reviews.title: First and last pair of Mizuno shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to try something different from my usual Saucony Hurricanes. These are in the same price point, and have solid reviews. What I got was a shoe that was too wide in the heel, and too narrow in the middle of the shoe. I wore these around my house for a few days, just to break them in a little. I tried tying and lacing them different ways but no matter what I did, my heel kept sliding out of the shoe. Plus, all the cushion they brag abbot in the description is in the heel of the shoe as well. Not a lot of mid foot cushion. I'm definitely sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: cherokee0014

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I've owned two previous pairs of Wave Creation 13, size 12. First trip out in the Wave Enigma, and I worked up a quarter sized blister on my heel. A size up I think would have prevented that. Would have rated higher, otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoe; fits a little narrow as compared to the Wave Rider
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased some Mizuno Wave Rider (19 I think) locally and really enjoyed the shows. Based upon input/research at Mizuno's site; I thought these Enigma's would be nearly identical fit with a little more "cushion". I guess there may be a little more forgiveness in the sole; but for some reason they fit tighter left to right at the ball of the foot. They will stretch over time; but odd they seem different between the two lines of shoes. Have enjoyed many pairs of Mizuno's
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Littel harder than asics but lighter.Easily to accelerate and not feel like step on poo.There is no need to worry about sweat would be left inside as cooling system so amazing.The middle panel of tread is plastic,not as same as asics strenghthened rubber,though it does good protection to arch.Strenghthen heel also keeps harm off.If weight exceed 65kga,then Prophecy or Asics GT-1000 would be a good choice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These shoes tilt inward somewhat (pronate), even though they are supposed to be neutral. The soles make a loud clicking sound and are a bit too stiff. They look good but I got them to run in so I will have to find another running shoe
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair just for casual wear since they were on sale and these are listed as a neutral shoe. I have only been wearing them a few days but I can say the cushion is good and they fit the same as the Inspire (been through many pairs). I will likely try running a few miles in these before the weekend just to see how I like them for that but I doubt they will be a better choice for me that the Inspire model.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: My 10k shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I've a low arch support and needs a wide shoe in other brands like Nike! After trying few brands like NB and Nike I decided to give it a try. And as others have mentioned it's a great shoe. Gives good support for low to medium arch foot.. I'm feeling low impact on my knees in last 3 runs.. They feel little bulky compared to other shoes but with all cushion & support I think I'm ok with it and lighter than I expected. I'm not a long distance runner but run 5k or 10k quite regularly. These are definitely worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Sudarshan

customer_reviews.title: all versions/years are comfortable thought feel and fit is a little different
customer_reviews.text: Since I have Enigma versions produced different years, I am a little surprised at different feel. The main difference I attribute to upper construction though the sole footprint and attaching structure to upper appears a little different--I have not researched the shoe. Nonetheless, all versions/years are comfortable thought feel and fit is a little different. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My "go to" running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Mizuno Wave Enigmas because I run about 30-40 miles per week and they fit my orthotics well, provide excellent lateral support, breath well and have great forefoot cushioning. 95% of my training is on rough trails and Mizuno Enigmas perform well. This is the third time that I have purchased the Enigmas as they have proven themselves to be a very high quality running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Hudcilia

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe almost a year ago for running and walking. It has held up well and is very comfortable for both running and walking. The shoe strings stay tight and tied, which might seem like a strange part of the shoe to review but I've had issues with this on other brands.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: These are nice..
customer_reviews.text: These are nice...more comfortable that the Mizuno Wave Creation 17's I purchased at the same time. Firm but cushioned ride, and a little springy. Not wild about the memory foam insoles as they trap heat along the bottom of my foot. Will probably end up replacing the insoles with gel material. Other than that...no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Junior_357

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoes, fits a little small !
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the best running shoes that I hace bought , very well cronstructed, very light weight & great quality materials, the only issue I found is that they tend to fit a little small, I usually get 10,5 D size on Asics or Saucony, but with this I ordered 1/2 size up and got an 11D size and perfect fit, as others have advised on their reviews here!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: These will replace my Enigmas from a couple years ago that are getting worn out. I liked those, and these seem even more comfortable. I'd like a slightly wider toe box, though these do provide sufficient room.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Weed

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. For a year I had knee pain and wasn't jogging much. After I purchased these the pain went away. I can't even explain the happiness I feel every time I wear them for my runs.
customer_reviews.author: CambridgeMA

customer_reviews.title: Good, but....
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the flaw is, but after about a month of wear this shoe starts to make a popping sound. This was my seoond pair and I thought the first pair was just made funny. Turns out it happens with them all. Otherwise there is a lot of support and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Deb K.

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars but this is one of the few true running shoes I've ever owned. I like it a lot. I have a wonky knee so I'm always worried about buying shoes online but this one seems to be perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: CChauncey

customer_reviews.title: This shoes are really comfortable. Every stroke you feel a smooth cushion and ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I am 6" tall, 205 pounds, running 3 times a week for 60minutes. This shoes are really comfortable. Every stroke you feel a smooth cushion and support. It is also way cheaper than other brands. I am normally Size 13.5 and I ordered 14 which give me a good little room and comfort. I was using Asics for many years but definitely I will use Mizuno from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo De Leon

customer_reviews.title: They provide excellent support and have a more cushy feel than the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had many types of Mizuno's and they have all fit similar. I have had a few versions of the Prophecy and at least three types(years) of the Wave Rider and they all fit just a little longer and slightly wider than these. I would still call them an 11 1/2 but a snug 11 1/2. They provide excellent support and have a more cushy feel than the Wave Rider and Prophecy.
customer_reviews.author: Marc V.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My feet are essentially flat, so if someone really needs additional support for their arches they may require another insert. My daughter thought that the shoes looked "cool". Rather different from the all black or gray shoes that I have bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: No major problems, but feel slightly unstable.
customer_reviews.text: Seem OK, but feel slightly unstable, sort of "tippy". No major issues.I bought these as running shoes, so the question about wearing them all day is meaningless as I only run about a hour every day.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ingle

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. As I got older I have had to stop running in whatever was on sale and move on to an actual running shoe. This does the trick and was at a great price. Around $60ish I think. Usually runs for $120.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno's are Mine
customer_reviews.text: I run a lot and it is great to have a shoe that is less expensive on Amazon than other retailers. The comfort is a must and this shoe delivers that.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Lopiccolo

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% sure that the pair I recieved are authentic ...
customer_reviews.text: Not 100% sure that the pair I recieved are authentic. They definitely are not as cushioned as the two pair of mizuno enigma 5's I own. All three were purchased within the same amount of time. Three different vendors used, this was the only one I'd call into question.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nick

customer_reviews.title: Well built shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's a shoe. There were $150 and I guess they are last years model, so I purchased them for about $78. I run in Hoka Bondi 4's, but these work well also.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: These fit and are comfortable towards running
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy brooks for my running shoes until I got the wave series from Mizuno. These fit and are comfortable towards running, especially long distances. I'd buy again when these wear down
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Not for ultramarathoners
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are too stiff. They dig into my feet so bad that it hurts to run. The problem seems to starts during long runs, 20 miles+. So if you are an endurance runner, try something else. This shoes maybe good for those training for short distance, like 1/2 marathon.
customer_reviews.author: koppenhagen

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe. Little stiffer than the blue pair I ...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. Little stiffer than the blue pair I got which was weird. My feet kinda prefer Mizunos for running.
customer_reviews.author: Soco

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight. Excel;lent shoe. Only downside (so minor it's almost not worth mentioning) is that the laces are so long they are nearl;y twice as long as necessary. Difficult to store them out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Dewline1

customer_reviews.title: Initial Quality is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Nike, Asics, Brooks, and Puma running shoes and without a doubt this is the best initial fit I've found. I've only been walking in the shoe (6 miles 4 to 6 times a week) for a week, but have found both the cushioning and stability to be great. I excited about the finding out about the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. K. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: First time getting shoes by this Mizuno company and like them a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Very high performance shoes. Look great too. First pair by this company, will probably buy again due to the way they feel. Have had them for a couple of months now. See how they are in a couple of more months.
customer_reviews.author: Joe DMann

customer_reviews.title: heel v comfortable. bottom plate hard
customer_reviews.text: a stability running shoe. toe box slightly wide. heel v comfortable. bottom plate hard. does not have forward propulsion/momentum like some shoes I have wore in the pass.
customer_reviews.author: W. Moy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, colorful, balancing around any rough ground surface, also keeping ankles straight to prevent hurt.
customer_reviews.author: White Knight

customer_reviews.title: The shoes were very comfortable. The Amazon Shoe sizer indicated I would need ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't ran in them yet, but wore them for a full day. The shoes were very comfortable. The Amazon Shoe sizer indicated I would need a half size bigger based on the running shoes I normally wear. Fit was perfect. Delivery was in two days.
customer_reviews.author: C. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of running sneakers. No break-in period. First run felt great. Good cushion and bounce to them. I've been wearing ASICS for a long time and decided to try something different. Really glad I bought these. The next pair I buy I will definitely get the wide version. If u have wide feet recommend that you get the wide version.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... pairs of Mizuno running shoes and they were very comfortable. The shoes are now made in Vietnam and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of Mizuno running shoes and they were very comfortable. The shoes are now made in Vietnam and am uncertain as to whether the quality is the same.
customer_reviews.author: George Parsons

customer_reviews.title: so I was happy when I saw that I could get the next ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the version 4 of this shoe, so I was happy when I saw that I could get the next version online for far cheaper than in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: They ask. They listen. They know their shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Snug light shoe that looks to be very durable. Loved their questions about the fit of previous shoes and comments as to how their shoes would compare on my foot. They got it right.
customer_reviews.author: Irish in Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Way to early to rate this shoe. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Way to early to rate this shoe. I have worn it briefly but have not exercised with it. Based on other Mizuno shoes I have owned, my left foot shoes is short.
customer_reviews.author: rdd

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect width and ice toebox
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect width and ice toebox. The cushioning is amazing. They are the perfect fit great for long distance or for your everyday workout
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Quality, a bit bulky
customer_reviews.text: Nice, comfy shoes. Just tried them on an 8K training. Good quality. Definitely for training long distance, not for 5K or 10K racing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable & Great Support;  Runs A Half Size Small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but they run about a 1/2 size small. I normally wear a 10.5 and this shoe in an 11 fits me "just right"
customer_reviews.author: Razzierb

customer_reviews.title: good price though
customer_reviews.text: i wish a 10.5 wide was available... had to get a 11 ... good price though... cant beat the wave enigma 5 ... will watch for more deals like these
customer_reviews.author: desiboy

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Best sneakers ever. Ordering another color. Have many brands over the years, no comparison. I use these for all purposes...not only running.
customer_reviews.author: Audioguy

customer_reviews.title: It is an amazing pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Hi guys, I am not a long distance runner. I usually runs 3-4 times a week and run 5-10 km each time. I have tried Asics Gel Kayano and Asics Gel Nimbus before. I have been using Mizuno for almost one month. It is an amazing pair of shoes. Comfort level is better than Asics. It fits snugly in front without being too tight. Cushioning during running is good. Honestly, I am able to run faster and longer compared to Asics. I will surely but this again.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with these shoes despite the fact that they were not my first choice. I bought them as a cheaper but respectable alternative to my favorite shoe which were only available at 25% higher price. I trust the Mizuno brand but know no other endurance runners who swear by this particular model. To my amazement and satisfaction, they provide a very comfortable ride and fabulous for my weekly long runs. At $70/paid, this was an excellent shoe for the price and will probably designate this as my favorite shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Scribe

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and we'll made shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and we'll made shoe, but has a narrow shoe box. I am accustomed to wearing New Balance shoes which are roomier.
customer_reviews.author: russell mote

customer_reviews.title: It feels like my feet/legs have adjusted
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first as I was getting increased calf pain with mileage over 4 mi. It feels like my feet/legs have adjusted, and things are better now.
customer_reviews.author: P. West

customer_reviews.title: I advocate Mizuno Running Shoes for its performance, structure, and in durability.
customer_reviews.text: Best Running shoe I have come across! Awesome structure, width, grip, and in durability. Highly advocate for the Mizuno Brand!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable support for all day walking or running--muted colors work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Harry A

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for plantar fasciitis - so far not running but have put 20 miles on them walking. So far so good. Better than a pair of Wave Inspire's I used for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: David Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great amount of cushion for a bigger guy
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes I have bought for the gym. Very impressed with the cushion. Much better than the Saucony and ASICS I tried on at the local Dicks Sporting Goods store and price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe. I replaced the stock insole with Sof ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I replaced the stock insole with Sof Sole Arch Performance Insoles which made them even more comfortable. I use these shoes for work and I'm on my feet for 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: j. k. polk

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the Wave Rider
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the Wave Rider, but just good enough. After trying this shoe I prefer the wave rider. I will probably use this shoe until is worn out, it is a good alternative to wave rider if it is too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond T.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for running
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Put them on and went for a run the first day I got them. They are light and feel great on long runs. These are very comfortable for running in.
customer_reviews.author: TheFamily

customer_reviews.title: its amazing O M G its sooooooooo comfy and cozy I ...
customer_reviews.text: its amazing O M G its sooooooooo comfy and cozy I love it and again amazon you are great guys the shipping oh my goodness in its time thank you so very much love you gays
customer_reviews.author: Inas Jammali

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These have a snug fit, especially width. This is what I was looking for. They actually feel a bit rigid when walking, but less so when running. This is a great runner. They weigh more than the wave riders I'm used to, but not enough to notice especially since they are more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Landrum

customer_reviews.title: I have the mizuno wave creation and I quite like them. This is my first purchase of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the mizuno wave creation and I quite like them. This is my first purchase of the enigma and I find them uncomfortable for running within the first 3 miles. It is primarily around the left forefoot and left great toe. This may not be a problem if you are a heel striker. I would not buy the enigma again while I am likely to buy the wave creation again.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Martin

customer_reviews.title: Buy .5 size larger than you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has been great to run/walk in but I would suggest that buyers opt to go with a size that is at least .5 sizes bigger than what you are used to. This style seems to run small. I had to return my first purchase for a larger size and am very happy that I did so
customer_reviews.author: Nateg511

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good running shoes. Fit as expected, comfortable to run, enough breathability.
customer_reviews.author: amazonfanboy

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I feel like they give me a strong spring back, good cushion and great support. I will be buying these for running from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lett

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, they look great, the fit is as expected and they very light and comfortable, definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Fry

customer_reviews.title: The shoe itself looked very nice and I wish they worked out but unfortunately they ...
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow and smaller than other brands. The shoe itself looked very nice and I wish they worked out but unfortunately they were too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Berry

customer_reviews.title: he says they are great for running around the track
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my brother; he says they are great for running around the track.
customer_reviews.author: SPK

customer_reviews.title: Shoe larger than my other size shoes
customer_reviews.text: Size 11 fits perfectly. The shoes are very comfortable on my long walks.
customer_reviews.author: Son John

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis and these shoes really help a lot. I'm walking on concrete floors 8 hours a day. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: these Enigma 5s make up for it by superior cushioning.
customer_reviews.text: Although its a bit heavier than my Nike Lunar tempos, these Enigma 5s make up for it by providing superior cushioning, lending them more forgiving on heel strikes as well (not that i heel strike :D )
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: NEED A WEEK TO BREAK-IN GOOD RUNNING SHOE
customer_reviews.text: TIGHT AT FIRST....NEED A WEEK TO BREAK-IN ... WEAR THIN SOCKS... GOOD RUNNING SHOE... ENIGMA 5
customer_reviews.author: roadbikerage

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoe I've had in a long time. Very comfortable and supportive. The shoe fits me perfectly. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G. Wills

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes just remember the size up one information
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 11 m so I ordered up to a 12m per other cust comments. my decision was as stated.Great shoes just remember the size up one information.
customer_reviews.author: mr. t.

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bought this brand for his last four pairs of running shoes. Usually he gets them at a sporting shoe store, but found them at Amazon for significantly less money. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: San Francisco which was hilly and his feet felt great!
customer_reviews.text: My son wore these for his fist marathon and he had no blisters on his feet. He broke them in for a few weeks before the race. San Francisco which was hilly and his feet felt great!
customer_reviews.author: Bon

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They are very cushionable. Now, I`ll always buy this brand
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Is this what heaven feels like?
customer_reviews.text: Some of the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn. Hugs my feet in all the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Pope

customer_reviews.title: They fit great, give great support
customer_reviews.text: They fit great, give great support, have high arches and are very comfortable! All of this and I got them for a great price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Sole came off in less than 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't write reviews. But I am writing this time because I am really disappointed with this shoes. I order it on 25th June 2016, it's less than 2 months and sole came off.
customer_reviews.author: Neon

customer_reviews.title: they have been great. Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I only wear these for workouts, but so far, they have been great. Comfortable fit, good support and seem durable (I have only had them for a few weeks)
customer_reviews.author: Jack Stewart

customer_reviews.title: 5 size bigger would been better otherwise it's
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a 0.5 size bigger would been better otherwise it's great
customer_reviews.author: vzoli73

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavier than my wave riders, but they offer lots of support, feel sturdy, feel like they could last on many long runs!
customer_reviews.author: K3ndahl

customer_reviews.title: The best for long distance runners, but check the size!
customer_reviews.text: I buy the same model and size since the Enigma 2, but it's the first time I found them slightly small for the size. I think they are the best, but next time I'll buy half a size more.
customer_reviews.author: Verónica S.

customer_reviews.title: Mizuno Mens Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are totally amazing in look fit and comfort! Being on "special of the day"...was an added bonus. Super great price!
customer_reviews.author: TMBW

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and I have problems w/ my heels at time. Went for a run, very comfortable and great fit for my foot. Great experience with company purchased from and it arrived ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz

customer_reviews.title: suprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a runner, but thought I would try these. I'm sold on the fit and comfort. Just bought a second pair of Mizuno shoes today.
customer_reviews.author: Howard McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Very nice running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've only put about 7 miles on them so far but I have to say they fit my needs quite well. They fit like a glove and are well cushioned which is good news for by back and joints.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Godin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable even though a little smaller. For my normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Otwell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Mizuno and just like the first. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: seeb combs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the shoes are terrific to run in and very cushiony
customer_reviews.author: Tim Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! My husband likes them so much he ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! My husband likes them so much he wants to purchase another pair! He was impressed with the quality given the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: 5th pair of Mizuno! The are the best--runner for over 45 years. Good support, attractive, and light.
customer_reviews.author: Jones Richard

customer_reviews.title: Feels like high quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Feels like high quality materials. Shoe laces are nice...a bit stretchy. Feels pretty stable and is on the higher end of cushioned. Its not a particularly light shoe, but if that means it is well constructed with materials that last, I'll take that over a light shoe that wears out to quickly. We'll see how they last. Update: I've been wearing these shoes all summer. I walk 4 to 6 miles a day since I have a German Shepherd in his prime in need of lots of exercise. Shoes are extremely durable. Still look like new. I have purchased 2 more pairs on sale. One to get a different color and one for when these eventually wear out.
customer_reviews.author: charles mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im glad I got these a half size bigger . they fit well ad are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amrish Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe nice color very comfy, was delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lild004

customer_reviews.title: Dbourc39
customer_reviews.text: This shoes run 1 size small.I order a size 8 way to small .order 8. 1/2 tight fit.should have order a size 9.other wise shoe is good

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hurts the feet from back... Wish i could return this.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is so comfortable. I can run for miles. I liked it so much.

product_meta.title: Mizuno Mens Wave Enigma 5-M Wave Enigma 5-m
product_meta.description: Premium cushion, a plush underfoot feel and glove like upper deliver maximum shock attenuation and a springy, floating sensation.

EVA strobel board last for underfoot comfort
Luxurious airmesh upper provides a glove like fit
